text: Alice Adams is a 1935 American romantic drama movie directed by George Stevens and is the second adaption of the 1921 novel of the same name by Booth Tarkington. It stars Katharine Hepburn, Fred MacMurray, Fred Stone, Frank Albertson, Hedda Hopper, Hattie McDaniel, Jonathan Hale, Evelyn Venable and RKO Radio Pictures. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1936. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1935 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by George Stevens
title: Alice Adams
